data.title: Find Your Community
data.meta_description: Find Your New Community at Rockford Homes. Search Search by Price, City or Area, School District or using the map.
data.text:
Clark Shaw Moors is located in the gorgeous community of Powell, OH, in one of Ohio’s fastest growing areas - Delaware County.

New homes near Grove City with low taxes & excellent schools! Foxfire offers a residents-only pool, pavilion & playground and is situated around the Players Club at Foxfire, an 18-hole Championship golf course

Harvest Curve, located in Powell, Ohio is a charming community that has some of the most important qualities a move-up area can offer- an ideal location, excellent schools, and premium conveniences.

The Aster Neighborhood in Jerome Village is conveniently located at the corner of Jerome Rd. and Blaney Rd. and is connected to our very popular Willowbrush Neighborhood. Resident amenities include access to the community pool, bike & walking trails, and the Community Center.

Rockford Homes is now building in the Meadowlark Neighborhood in Jerome Village. This neighborhood is located just minutes from Dublin, which offers plenty of dining, shopping, and outdoor activities for families. Residents will have access to the community pool, fitness facility, and over 15 miles of walking and bike trails.

The Rosewood Neighborhood features 58 exclusive and larger home sites that are within walking distance of the elementary and middle schools. You’ll appreciate the all-natural exteriors and the extensive list of included and upgraded finishes.

The Sagebrush Neighborhood features 50 exclusive home sites within walking distance of the elementary and middle schools. You’ll appreciate the all-natural exteriors along with a healthy list of included features.

Meadow Grove Estates North is located in a very impressive area of Grove City. It's close to one of the best golf courses in Columbus at nearby Pinnacle Golf Club and only a few minutes from historic Grove City.

Meadow Grove Reserve is a beautiful condominium community located in a very impressive new area of Grove City. It's just minutes from nearby Pinnacle Golf Club and historic Grove City.

Mitchell Highlands is a gorgeous community and part of one of Ohio’s most vibrant and friendly areas with safe neighborhoods, numerous parks, bike paths, and a more.

Rolling Hills is a beautiful site located on the former Sunbury Golf Course with plenty of open green space, several picturesque ponds, and walking trails throughout!

Stockdale Farms is one of the best master planned communities located in southern Delaware County boasting amenities like a clubhouse within a five-minute walk from most homesites.

Tarlton Meadows, located in the bustling Hilliard area is ideally situated close to shopping and schools with easy access to major traffic arteries.

Terra Alta located in southern Delaware is nestled within picturesque nature reserves and has easy access to Alum Creek State Park which allows you to experience a truly country feel.

The Overlook is a gorgeous community located in the heart of Fairfield County. This established, move-up community features homesites with beautiful valley views surrounded by rolling terrain.

The Run at Hofbauer Preserve offers a beautiful country setting with various choices of Rockford’s best single-family homes, lots of green space, and a beautiful Sensory Garden.
